sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Header></Header>
  <router-view/>
  <Footer></Footer>

</template>

<script>

import Footer from './components/Footer.vue'
import Header from './components/Header.vue';
import axios from 'axios'
import { computed } from 'vue'



export default {
    name:'app',
    components:{

      Footer,
      Header

    },
    created: function(){
    this.postList();
  },
  data(){
    return {
      radio: ["a"],
      blog: ["s"]
    }
  },
  provide(){
    return {
      radio: computed(()=>this.radio),
      blog: computed(()=>this.blog)
    }
  },
  methods: {
    postList(){
      let ths = this;
      axios
      .get('http://localhost/radio-site/wordpress/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/')
      .then(function(response){
        console.log(response.data.length)
        for(let i = 0; i < response.data.length; i++) {
          if(response.data[i].categories_info[0].name === "ブログ") {
            ths.blog.push(
              {
                category: response.data[i].categories_info[0].name,
                title: response.data[i].title.rendered,
                date: response.data[i].date,
                thumb: response.data[i].thumbnail_url,
                tag:  response.data[i].tags_info[0].name
              }
            ) 
          } else if(response.data[i].categories_info[0].name === "ラジオ"){
            ths.radio.push(
              {
                category: response.data[i].categories_info[0].name,
                title: response.data[i].title.rendered,
                date: response.data[i].date,
                thumb: response.data[i].thumbnail_url,
                tag:  response.data[i].tags_info[0].name
              }
            ) 
          } else {
            console.log("error")
          }
        }
      })
      .catch(function(error) {
        console.log(error);
      });

    }
  }
    

}
</script>

<style>
@import "./css/destyle.css";
#app {
  background-color: rgb(255, 245, 220);
}

</style>
